panels.description: I/O wait CPU load ~ time spent (%) waiting for I/O operations to complete

targets.query: SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_iowait_load") FROM "history"."cpu_info" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: CPU - Wait

panels.description: System CPU load ~ time spent (%) in kernel space (I/Os, device drivers, etc.)

targets.query: SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_system_load") FROM "history"."cpu_info" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: CPU - System

panels.description: User CPU load ~ time spent (%) in user space (actual computation)

targets.query: SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_user_load") FROM "history"."cpu_info" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: CPU - User

panels.description: Nice CPU load ~ time spent (%) in (re)niced user space (actual computation)

targets.query: SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_nice_load") FROM "history"."cpu_info" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: CPU - Nice

panels.description: GPU load ~ time spent (%) in each GPU (actual computation)

targets.query: SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_gpu_load") FROM "history"."gpu" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: GPU

targets.query: SELECT LAST("MAX_total_bytes")-LAST("${AGGR}_available_bytes") FROM "history"."mem_info" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.description: Memory used, including (reclaimable) buffers and cache

targets.query: SELECT LAST("MAX_total_bytes")-LAST("${AGGR}_free_bytes") FROM "history"."mem_info" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Memory - Used

targets.query: SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_mem_used_bytes") FROM "history"."gpu" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.description: Writes time spent waiting for device to complete operations

targets.query: SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_writes_latency_seconds_per_op") FROM "history"."io_disk" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ AND "device" =~ /^${Disk}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device"

panels.title: Disk - WR:latency

panels.description: Writes bytes (per second), actually written to device

targets.query: SELECT 512*LAST("${AGGR}_writes_sectors_per_second") FROM "history"."io_disk" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ AND "device" =~ /^${Disk}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device"

panels.title: Disk - WR:throughput

panels.description: Writes operations (per second), completed by kernel space

targets.query: SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_writes_completed_per_second") FROM "history"."io_disk" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ AND "device" =~ /^${Disk}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device"

panels.title: Disk - WR:iops

panels.description: Reads time spent waiting for device to complete operations

targets.query: SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_reads_latency_seconds_per_op") FROM "history"."io_disk" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ AND "device" =~ /^${Disk}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device"

panels.title: Disk - RD:latency

panels.description: Reads bytes (per second), actually read from device

targets.query: SELECT 512*LAST("${AGGR}_reads_sectors_per_second") FROM "history"."io_disk" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ AND "device" =~ /^${Disk}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device"

panels.title: Disk - RD:throughput

panels.description: Reads operations (per second), completed by kernel space

targets.query: SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_reads_completed_per_second") FROM "history"."io_disk" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ AND "device" =~ /^${Disk}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device"

panels.title: Disk - RD:iops

targets.query: SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_tx_bytes_per_second") FROM "history"."net_dev" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ AND "device" =~ /^${IFace}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device"

SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_rx_bytes_per_second") FROM "history"."net_dev" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ AND "device" =~ /^${IFace}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device"

SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_tcp4_established_count") FROM "history"."net_conn" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

SELECT LAST("${AGGR}_tcp6_established_count") FROM "history"."net_conn" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

list.name: Task
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "history"."cpu_info" WITH KEY = "task"

list.name: Serie
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "history"."cpu_info" WITH KEY = "serie" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/

list.name: Host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "history"."cpu_info" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/

list.name: Disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "history"."io_disk" WITH KEY = "device" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/

list.name: IFace
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "history"."net_dev" WITH KEY = "device" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${Host}$/
